timeline.message: 6455 Added the ability to modify justification and confidence in the Persona details panel

timeline.bodyText:
Per our coding guidelines (shared with you), the method documentation should follow standard English capitalization and periods etc.
I wont hold up this PR, but if you can address these, and keep in mind future, that would be great.
timeline.author: raman-bt
